results.marketing_text: Let the good times reign at Excalibur. Unique shows and entertainment, eclectic dining options, including a new Food Court and fun around every corner make the only castle on The Strip, the perfect place to come as you are.

amenities.description: Wireless internet connection in public areas
Hotel does not provide pornographic films/TV

results.marketing_text: One of the most iconic hotels on The Strip, the Luxor pyramid invites curiosity while its interior rewards visitors with equal parts excitement, mystery and intrigue. This resort features a wide variety of entertainment and world class exhibits.

amenities.description: Wireless internet connection in public areas
